mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_user (username, `password`, salt, real_name, gender, phone_number, email, pwd_update_time, file_id, org_id, remark, isvalid, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by) VALUES (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gender,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{phoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, now(), #{fileId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{orgId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1, now(), #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, now(), #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.select: SELECT id, username, password, salt, real_name AS realName, gender, phone_number AS phoneNumber, email, last_login_time AS lastLoginTime, pwd_update_time AS pwdUpdateTime, file_id AS fileId, org_id AS orgId, is_locked AS isLocked, remark, isvalid, create_time AS createBy, create_by AS createBy, update_time AS updateTime, update_by AS updateBy FROM sys_user WHERE isvalid = 1 AND id = #{id}
